text: Billy Russell Kinard (December 16, 1933 - June 30, 2018) was an American football player and coach. Kinard was born in Jackson, Mississippi. He played professionally as a defensive end for the Cleveland Browns and Green Bay Packers of the National Football League (NFL) and the Buffalo Bills of the American Football League (AFL). Kinard died on June 30, 2018 in Fort Payne, Alabama at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Obituary Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American football defensive ends Category:American football coaches Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi Category:People from Jackson, Mississippi
title: Billy Kinard
